text.data: The Green Continent of Campbell Granbelos Fortress[end]
Palpaleos: Asleep...[end]
Sauzer: Palpaleos... There you are. You can't sleep either?[end]
Palpaleos: No...[end]
Sauzer: Don't worry about it. Can you feel it...? The legend we dreamed of is here, now.[end]
Palpaleos: On this green continent of Campbell?[end]
The legend we dreamed of...[end]

Sauzer: Yes... This girl will fulfill our dreams...
She will fulfill the legend.[end]
No, it's rude of me to call her a girl. Princess [character][0x1] has become very beautiful.[end]
Palpaleos... The day we leave is close at hand. Please rest.[end]
Palpaleos...[end]
Look at the sky...[end]
The sky is ours. But not all of it.[end]
Sauzer...[end]
Palpaleos: The legend of the Holy Dragons...[end]
Sauzer: There is a legend... One spoken of in Kahna. Do you know of it?[end]
Sauzer: Do you think I can do it?[end]
Do you think I can become the man of legend?[end]
I am the man who conquered the skies. If there are any battles before me, I will accept the challenge.[end]
And then I will achieve victory![end]
Palpaleos: Victory for a new era...[end]
Sauzer: A new victory together. Always be at my side, Palpaleos.[end][end]
